execution_quality: Good execution with minor friction. Agent identified the project structure, created an appropriate spec file with clear sections, and completed the core request. Two errors encountered but recovered from them.
work_category: Documentation task: writing architectural specification to a spec/ file based on recent discussion. Straightforward request to capture design decisions in a structured document.
summary: Agent completed the documentation task by creating a well-structured spec file capturing architectural purpose and plan. Execution was largely autonomous and error-free despite two minor errors encountered and recovered. User interrupted mid-interaction for tool use rather than completing the exchange, suggesting engagement with the output rather than dissatisfaction.
follow_up_pattern: User interrupted for tool use immediately after, suggesting they were reviewing the output in real-time and wanted to take some action. No explicit approval or rejection before interruption.
